entry.title: Melodious Salok Mahala 9
entry.summary: GNG Bradford · Salok Kabeer Jeeo Ke - Bhai Raghbir SIngh & Bhai Jeevan Singh 04/05/2020 Slow and melodious recitation…
entry.content:
GNG Bradford · Salok Kabeer Jeeo Ke - Bhai Raghbir SIngh & Bhai Jeevan Singh 04/05/2020

Slow and melodious recitation of Salok Bhagat Kabir Jeeo Ke – Dhan Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji

Follow with translations here: www.sikhitothemax.org/shabad?id=4969

Recited during the live broadcast before Rehras Sahib jaap on Monday 4th May 2020, during the lockdown period of the pandemic. Bhai Raghbir Singh and Jeevan Singh doing seva.

entry.title: Sikh Art Exhibition
entry.summary: It was a great pleasure to host the opening of the Khalsa Fitness – Sikh Art Exhibition on Saturday 18th…
entry.content:
It was a great pleasure to host the opening of the Khalsa Fitness – Sikh Art Exhibition on Saturday 18th of June 2016. The event was held at the Khalsa Fitness Gym which is located at Guru Nanak Gurdwara, Usher Street, Bradford.

The exhibition included works by many artists, some local, national and international. All exhibits have been carefully chosen to inspire and spiritually enlighten the sangat on Guruji’s message and tell the story of our great Sikh history.

The artworks on display are all very unique and inspiring, we are sure that they will be enjoyed and will provoke a sense of pride and emotion, along with educating us all in our rich history.

On launch day we had some of the artists talking about what inspired them to take up art and sharing with us their inspiration and the messages of their fantastic work.

Many thanks to:

Raj Singh – Pentacular pentacularartist.wix.com/pentacularartist
Amandeep Singh – Inkquisitive http://www.inkquisitive.com/
Iminder Singh – Iminder Arts
Gurpreet Singh – Loha Designs Website
Music by: Taren Kaur (UK) – “Oh My Father”
